turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my account balance and see recent transactions.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can certainly help with that. Please verify your identity by entering your account number and password. Once you've done that, I can display your balance and the last ten transactions.  Please type your information in the following format: Account Number: [Your Account Number], Password: [Your Password]

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I've done that. But I don't understand one of the transactions. It says 'ACH Debit - XYZ Corp' for $150.00. I don't remember authorizing that, and I'm starting to get pretty frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Based on the information, it appears an ACH debit was processed. To help you further, can you provide me with the date of the transaction? I will then review the origin of this transaction by using the transaction ID. If there is a dispute, I can explain the steps to open a dispute case. Please be aware, however, that due to privacy reasons, I cannot directly provide the merchant's name associated with the transaction. However, I will provide the contact information for XYZ Corp so you can directly ask them for details. Would you like me to proceed?
